title: [Large-Scale] Hypercube Model-Based Practical Competency Strengthening for E-Learning Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: VR-based simulation training for elementary teachers analyzing pedagogical shifts from traditional to e-learning: Design considerations for smartphone-limited contexts

learning_goals: Using the hypercube innovation model, learners can explain at least three differences between traditional classrooms and E-learning environments in terms of technology/learning models
Through VR simulations, learners can identify at least two changes in learner-instructor roles in E-learning environments and propose practical strategies
Learners can analyze three core institutional competencies for E-learning adoption and design strategies applicable in resource-constrained technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
